TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CloudCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

Docs.summary: Represents a container for elements. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks All members of the class are inherited from the Collection\<T> class. Only those methods which are overridden are described below.This collection holds instances of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> element, which contain peer information for peer-to-peer networking.
References of this type are returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.GetCloudByName%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.GetAvailableClouds%2A> methods.
